name: Use Your Head (The4thAD)
description:
A really short game experimenting with a mechanic. You are a tribe warrior who needs to pass a series of trials to become the chief. In order to complete the trials however, you will need to embrace death... whatever that means.

 Didn't have a lot of time to work on this since I was travelling and had to go through a bunch of quarantine procedures, but I managed to cobble something together. Hope you enjoy!
